summary: Aren\'t all of you annoyed seeing your girls have shortened calfs ? Using female\'s TERA greaves/boots. Long Live sexy legs!
descriptionHtml:
[center]REQUIREMENT
=============
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Latest SKSE[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863/?]Latest SkyUI[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846//?]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36213/]HDT HighHeels System[/url]
If you like my mod, pls also endorse those mods

Anything else? 
Yes, use UNP/UNPB body to prevent clipping.[/center]

[center]FEATURES
=========[/center]
Use HDT Features to TERA Armors for UNP mod (courtesy of  Asianboy345). To put it simple I make the boots actually match the \"actual heels\" and make it looks no longer shorter while you compare it when you are using normal/vanilla boots. Each boots has different high elevation. Its ratio between 4-7 point of Z axis. Not all of the boots/greaves that come from Asianboy pack that I\'ve converted. You can say it around 70% of female boots. Around 5-10%, I\'m not considered it as boots. For other 20%, still on going. Well Below is the list of Variant that I made

[center]KNOWN ISSUES
==============[/center]
I try my best to eliminate the gap between the ground and the boots/heels without making it to not clip with the ground it self. If any chance you found it, use MCM from HDT feature to fix it.

[center]CREDITS, THANKS & ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS:
